article_title: How CVS Caremark Is Redefining Corporate Social Responsibility

article_metadata.author: Rahim Kanani

og.description: “The decision to stop selling cigarettes was one that came with a financial risk. Eliminating $2B in sales is not something that is done every day by a Fortune 12 publicly-traded company...despite this loss in revenue, we were willing to take that risk, to ensure a positive impact on the [...]
